skills.name: FERVOR
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.
• 35% Chance to Transform Golden Effects into Marks and gain Charge on Perfects.
• Charge increases the effectiveness of the next damage ability used by 80%.

skills.name: THIEVE
desc: • Deals true damage to a single target.

skills.name: FOCUS
desc: Grants increased Accuracy to all allies for 2 turns at the start of battle.
